name: @ui5/ts-interface-generator
description: Generator for TypeScript type definitions for custom UI5 controls implemented in TypeScript
author: SAP SE

scripts.try: npm run build && node dist/generateTSInterfaces.js --config tsconfig-testcontrol.json
scripts.try-watch: npm run build && node dist/generateTSInterfaces.js --watch --config tsconfig-testcontrol.json
scripts.try-watch-managedobject: npm run build && node dist/generateTSInterfaces.js --watch --config tsconfig-testmanagedobject.json
scripts.try-watch-webcomponent: npm run build && node dist/generateTSInterfaces.js --watch --config tsconfig-testwebcomponent.json
